steps: step 1: Navigate to organization/*/settings/test-environment-installation
step 2: Click on link dockerEnvironment -> Navigate to page 'organization/*/settings/test-environment-installation/docker-agent'
step 3: Click on link localEnvironment
step 4: Connect a repository for testing and input necessary details.
step 5: Schedule a test run with various configurations and settings.
step 6: Click on link history -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-runs'
step 7: Click on header scheduleTestRunAgent1
step 8: Click on button sessions12
step 9: Click on button failedTestResults2
step 10: Click on link dashboard -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*'
step 11: Click on link planning -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/releases'
step 12: Click on link tests -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-cases'
step 13: Click on link testSuites -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites'
step 14: Click on link testCases -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-cases'
step 15: Click on span object3
step 16: Click on span object7
step 17: Click on span object4
step 18: Click on link testSuites -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites'
step 19: Click on link testObjects -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-objects'
step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
